price: dan janganlah kamu menjadi sebagai orang-orang (munafik) yang berkata, "Kami mendengarkan603, padahal mereka tidak mendengarkan.
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ سَمِعۡنَا وَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ
footnotes: 603.  Maksudnya mereka mendengarkan tetapi hati mereka mengingkarinya.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā takūnū ka-alladhīna qālū samiʿ'nā wahum lā yasmaʿūna
